title: LF Team just to play with
body:
Just looking for a team to play with, don't really care if serious or not, also have skype for better communication
I play mid - currently in silver 1
Add me in game : Lapras2

replies.body: Looking for the same thing, if you start one up give me a shout
Awesome, add me and we will get this team started
I'm interested in playing ranked mainly for the fun of it, but also to learn more about the game. I mainly Supp and ADC, but can Top if need be. I'm Silver 4. (:
Nice, the more the better, add me and we will start climbing :)

I'm only level 23 and on my way to 30 for ranked but if you're looking for team mates for normal or team builder I play top of JG.

I'll add you in game when patch is done: Reverse Kanga
Awesome, add me when you can
